name: Pyke
title: the Bloodharbor Ripper
shortBio: A renowned harpooner from the slaughter docks of Bilgewater, Pyke should have met his death in the belly of a gigantic jaull-fish… and yet, he returned. Now, stalking the dank alleys and backways of his former hometown, he uses his new supernatural gifts to bring a swift and gruesome end to those who make their fortune by exploiting others—and a city that prides itself on hunting monsters now finds a monster hunting them.

skins.name: Sand Wraith Pyke
skins.description: The vengeful ghost of an ancient caravan master betrayed by his guards, Pyke now lurks within the golden halls of the desert's remaining city-states. He hunts anyone and everyone who attracts his gaze, claiming they all condemned him to death.

skins.name: Blood Moon Pyke

chromas.name: Blood Moon Pyke (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2019.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2019.

skins.description: A demonic spearfisher lurking within the darkness of the Blood Moon's mirror dimension, Pyke casts his hooked blade across an endless, liquid night, dragging demons up from the bottom of the world and into their human hosts. Inexorably tied to the Blood Moon, Pyke's sudden appearance in Ionia is a dire omen indeed…

skins.name: PROJECT: Pyke

chromas.name: PROJECT: Pyke (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

chromas.name: PROJECT: Pyke (Reckoning)

descriptions.description: Loot exclusive gained during the 2019 PROJECT event.

chromas.description: Loot exclusive gained during the 2019 PROJECT event.

skins.description: An early PROJECT prototype, Pyke's untested upgrades left him violently unstable—too much so for his handlers, who junked him and threw his remains outside the walls of the City. Yet his cybernetic brain survived, rebuilding Pyke with salvaged scrap parts from all around him, and now their fragmented, overlapping memories mix with his own as they scream out for revenge.

skins.name: PsyOps Pyke

chromas.name: PsyOps Pyke (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.name: PsyOps Pyke (Hunter)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 PsyOps event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 PsyOps event.

skins.description: A member of the Black Rose Group's leadership and a powerful spiritual medium, Pyke's mastery of psychic power allows him to jump across the barrier separating the living and the dead. This process has slowly eaten at his mind, leaving him a half-deranged killer screaming at literal ghosts.

skins.name: Sentinel Pyke

chromas.name: Sentinel Pyke (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.name: Sentinel Pyke (Resolute)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Sentinel event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Sentinel event.

skins.description: Pyke may seem an unlikely Sentinel to take up the oath, but Viego's name is next on his list. Pacified—for now—by the influence of Nagakabouros, the real danger is that he might snap at any moment, killing allies and enemies alike.

skins.name: Ashen Knight Pyke

chromas.name: Ashen Knight Pyke (Emberwoken)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

skins.description: Condemned to death for petty crimes, then saved by the king and uplifted to glorious knighthood, Pyke served in the war against magic until the very end, only to be left alone in an ashen world without. Gripped by violent madness, he challenges all who pass, accusing them of being the ruler who abandoned him.

skins.name: Empyrean Pyke

chromas.name: Empyrean Pyke (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.name: Empyrean Pyke (Neon Flare)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2022 Event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2022 Event.

skins.description: Pyke remembers little before falling into the embrace of the Foreglow, only that he was defending his home. Waking in a new realm as the first Empyrean, he hears the whispers of other Pykes across the dimensions, taunting him from their homes. Why was his lost and not theirs? No answer will satisfy his searing rage, except vengeance.

skins.name: Soul Fighter Pyke

chromas.name: Soul Fighter Pyke (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.name: Soul Fighter Pyke (Limitless)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2023 Soul Fighter event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2023 Soul Fighter event.

skins.description: This un-alived assailer has unfinished business: duking it out in the ring! Now, I can't say if returning from the dead proves the existence of the "Lands Beyond." (I don't get paid enough to PONDER MY EXISTENCE!) But if rumors are true, and this fighter's friend brought him back from the brink... then we're in for a HELL of a fight! Here's Pyke!

skins.name: Prestige Soul Fighter Pyke
skins.description: Pyke's fashion-forward fit impresses not only the rich and famous at the Gala of Souls, but all those watching at home—and his fans from the Lands Beyond. The edgy aesthetics and glossy flame motifs all but guarantee him a spot on the list of any discerning judge. After all, if Pyke's not on your list, you'll end up on his...

skins.name: Fright Night Pyke

chromas.name: Fright Night Pyke (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

chromas.name: Fright Night Pyke (Ghoulish)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2024 event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2024 event.

skins.description: Campers flail their way to shore, desperate to escape the deranged lifeguard dragging them to the depths. Cutting through chaos and frantic coughing, Pyke's waterlogged whistle pierces the air. Filled with dread, ready to accept their fate, the campers are met by the fishman giving them two thumbs up. They all survived the race!

skins.name: Inkshadow Pyke

chromas.name: Inkshadow Pyke (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2025.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2025.

skins.description: Pyke can hear the ink's whisper. It speaks of pacts and vengeance, of traitors choking on the ash of a city in ruins. Pyke paid the price for his power, and now power is all that he is—no longer a man, but a phantom of Rabadon City. Yet slivers of truth bleed through the haze of his mind, imbuing him with a renewed sense of purpose: drown the Cabal.

passive.name: Gift of the Drowned Ones
passive.description: When Pyke is hidden from enemies, he regenerates damage that he has recently taken from champions. Pyke also cannot gain extra Maximum Health from any source, and instead gains Bonus AD.

spells.name: Bone Skewer
spells.description: Pyke either stabs an enemy in front of him or pulls an enemy towards him.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Tap: Pyke stabs, dealing @TotalDamage@ physical damage to the first enemy hit, preferring champions. They are then Slowed by @SlowAmount*100@% for @SlowDuration@ second.

Hold: Pyke throws his harpoon, dealing @TotalDamage@ physical damage to the first enemy hit and Pulling them towards him. They are then Slowed by @SlowAmount*100@% for @SlowDuration@ second.

If Pyke successfully hits an enemy champion or the channel does not complete successfully, @ManaRefund*100@% of the Mana cost is refunded.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Ghostwater Dive
spells.description: Pyke enters Camouflage and gains significant Move Speed that decays over time.
spells.dynamicDescription: Pyke gains <keywordStealth>Camouflage</keywordStealth> and <speed>@MoveSpeed@% Move Speed</speed> decaying over @Effect10Amount@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Phantom Undertow
spells.description: Pyke dashes and leaves behind a phantom that will return to him, stunning enemy champions along its path.
spells.dynamicDescription: Pyke dashes, leaving a drowned phantom behind him that returns to him shortly. The phantom <status>Stuns</status> for @StunDuration@ seconds and deals <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ physical damage</physicalDamage> to champions.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Death From Below
spells.description: Pyke blinks to and executes low health enemies, allowing him to cast this spell again and granting additional gold to an ally who assists.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Pyke strikes all enemy champions in an X, teleporting to and executing targets below @RDamage@ Health. Champions above the threshold and non-champions instead take physical damage equal to @ReducedDamage*100@% of that amount (@ReducedDamageFinal@).

When an enemy champion dies inside the X, Pyke can Recast this Ability for free within @RRecastDuration@ seconds. If he executed that champion, the last assisting ally will also get kill gold. If he did not, he will still get kill gold as if he did.
@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
